alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Cascade; Fergus; Gallatin; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Broadwater, Meagher, Judith Basin, central Fergus, northeastern Gallatin and southeastern Cascade Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Roy to near Manhattan. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, White Sulphur Springs, Stanford, Manhattan, Hobson, Moore, Toston, Roy, Fergus, Neihart, Windham, Forestgrove, Sapphire Village, Fort Logan, Utica, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Danvers, Maudlow, Trident and Checkerboard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 279 and 288. Highway 200 between mile markers 27 and 107. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 94. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 78. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
